  ids: !r sample(1000:5000, 4)

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, comment = NA, error= FALSE, cache = FALSE}

# Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(Hmisc)
library(brew)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(kableExtra)
library(bohemia)
library(qrcode)
## Global options
opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE,
	             cache=FALSE,
               comment=NA,
               message=FALSE,
               warning=FALSE)
ids <- params$ids
```

```{r}
ids <- as.character(ids)
chunks <- paste0('\n# ', ids, '\n\n',
                 '```{r}\n',
                 'create_qr("', ids, '")\n```\n\\newpage\n')
chunks <- paste0(chunks, collapse = '\n')

file_connection <- file('children.Rmd')
writeLines(paste0('---\noutput: pdf_document\n---\n\n', 
                  chunks), 
           file_connection)
close(file_connection)

```
